opendial.state.distribs

Class EquivalenceDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.state.distribs.EquivalenceDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProbDistribution

    public class EquivalenceDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProbDistribution
    Representation of an equivalence distribution (see dissertation p. 78 for details) with two possible values: true or false. The distribution is essentially defined as:

    P(eq=true | X, X^p) = 1 when X = X^p and != None = NONE_PROB when X = None or X^p = None = 0 otherwise.

    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-10-16 22:53:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
